ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ifcld.a | |- ( ph -> A e. C ) |
| 2 |  | ifcld.b | |- ( ph -> B e. C ) |
| 3 |  | #P_ifcl | |- ( ( A e. C /\ B e. C ) -> if ( ps , A , B ) e. C ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> if ( ps , A , B ) e. C ) |
